Malkurs Ride was a street of hard-packed dirt and gravel in the North Ward of Waterdeep.Across the editions this street went unlabeled on maps of Waterdeep. It was only revealed by Ed Greenwood on November 14, 2021.
This street stretched from north to south, going south from Zendulth Street and terminating at the Beaconmarch. At its midpoint, the alleyway Selvur Alley stretched between it and the Beaconmarch.
Malkurs Ride was named for Malkur, a notorious adventurer and mage of the early 1300s DR, who frequently galloped down it on a phantom steed while experimenting with a speed-enhancing spell.
